titles: Hiren: or The faire Greeke: By William Barksted, one of the seruants of his Maiesties reuels
author: Barksted, William, fl. 1611.
publisher: Printed [by N. Okes] for Roger Barnes, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery lane, ouer against the Rolles,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
